comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:7.0.1) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/7.0.1
Build ID: 20110928134238

Steps to reproduce:

Opened specific webpage (see attached file) in firefox 7.0.1, running in Mac OS X 10.6.8 while Adobe Photoshop CS5 is running.


Actual results:

the keyboard shortcuts in Photoshop CS5 involving the spacebar stopped working (such as holding the spacebar to switch to the "hand" tool.


Expected results:

Keyboard shortcuts in Photoshop CS5 should not be effected.
